text.section: If an inmate violates a condition imposed for the inmate's conduct, custody, or employment, the inmate shall be returned to the court.

The court may:
require that the balance of the inmate's sentence be served in actual confinement; and
cancel any earned diminution of the inmate's term of confinement.
